DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objectives : - To longitudinally assess natural history symptom ( prevalence , severity , pattern symptom , relationship physical psychological distress ) among post-thoracic surgery non-small cell lung cancer patient early stage ( stage I-IIIA ) disease . - To determine crisis event ( symptom severe ) , relationship cancer therapy , surgical technique disease , relationship function quality life ; determine current practice pattern symptom control throughout six month post-surgical phase . - To determine utility weekly , telephone-administered interactive voice response symptom assessment ( IVR-MDASI ) identify emergent clinically significant symptom population . - To develop symptom severity critical value critical treatment algorithm post-operative symptom control NSCLC patient .

DOC.detailed_description: Before surgery , ask complete four survey mood , symptom , quality life , smoke history . Completing questionnaire take 20 minute . You ask information age , sex , race , education , marital status , employment status ( full-time , part-time , unemployed ) . Before surgery , research nurse teach use special telephone system , call Interactive Voice Response ( IVR ) telephone system . This system use track symptoms home . An instruction pamphlet also give . Three day surgery , hospital , ask research nurse complete one questionnaires measure symptom . Once home hospital , automatic telephone IVR system call prescheduled time convenient . The phone call take four minute complete . The IVR call week first 3 month surgery , every two week additional 3 month . The research nurse call one week surgery one month , three month , six month complete four questionnaire symptom , mood , quality life , smoke history . It take 20 minute complete questionnaire . The information collect IVR research purpose , must report symptom concerned physician nurse . Should severe symptom develop , research staff notify treatment team . This investigational study .
